title: Home and Away spoilers: Robbo heartbroken after Jasmine kidnapping update
text:
Robbo is distraught about Jasmine’s kidnapping (Picture: Channel 5)

Robbo (Jake Ryan) has been desperately looking for clues about Jasmine’s (Sam Frost) whereabouts after discovering the Ouroboros gang kidnapped her – and shot Scott (Trent Baines) – when they were on their way to the airport to get her sent overseas for her own safety. After Colby (Tim Franklin) spots the kidnappers’ car heading to Reefton Lakes, Robbo becomes increasingly frustrated that he hasn’t even heard anything from them.

Eventually, Robbo gets a phone call from Des (Matt Zeremes). He says he’s feeling generous, so briefly puts Jasmine on the line before swiping the phone away from her again. He then proceeds to make his demands crystal clear – either Robbo delivers Dylan Carter (Jeremy Lindsay Taylor), or he’ll never see his wife again.

Robbo warns Des that if he so much as touches Jasmine, he’s a dead man. But Des remains confident, knowing that all of the power is in his hands. Meanwhile, Jasmine’s fate is left hanging by a thin thread.

Robbo finds Jasmine’s wedding rings (Picture: Channel 5)

Murray brings Colby and Robbo news of an armed robbery of a chemist in Reefton Lakes, which makes them wonder if it’s related to Jasmine. After seeing the list of items stolen, Robbo realises Jasmine is trying to send him a message. They now know to look in the Reefton Lakes area, and search for old abandoned buildings until they see the warehouse.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Colby forces Robbo to wait until daylight before making a move on the building. Meanwhile, Jasmine has been trying to stall so Robbo has a better chance of reaching her. However, Des is onto her, knowing it’s only a matter of time before the cops connect the kidnapping and the chemist.

The next day, Robbo, Colby and the cops head out to the building, trying to proceed with the element of surprise. Robbo is devastated when they enter the warehouse to discover they were too late – Jasmine is gone. The only thing left behind is Jasmine’s wedding rings…

description: Robbo gets a call from Des and races to rescue Jasmine.
